comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

It's a vary good game so hood i can't believe it's on mobile game! Also the game mechanics are so amazing as well. Then there's series of things you have to do that keeps you in the game for a long time; the theme and music fit the atmosphere, and there's not much of a problem with the game either. "This game gives me goosebumps!" (From Dashigames aka Dachi) he loves it as well too. #goodgamemakemore

I love this game, especially when you hide just in time and there's that tense moment wondering if she saw you. I get chills down my spine when I'm hiding and I hear her saying "I see you". If I could, I would give this game 100 stars. I would suggest having a mode after you beat Granny to become Granny because I think it would be cool to chase the player around the house. Also, I think the game would benefit from a much bigger house, more drawers and of course, more locks. Love the game, keep up the good work.

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ üòÉüëç

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.

descriptionHTML:
70 million players around the world play the game in 15 languages.

A friendly zombie falls in love with a girl and sets off in search for Zombium to become a Human.

The world of zombies is vast, bright, and full of funny characters. Explore magnificent islands and make your way through the thickets to take a step closer to solving the Zombie’s secret. Grow unusual plants, fruits, and flowers to cook Zombium. Construct world famous buildings, complete tasks, and decorate your island to become a Human and find your Love.

In the game you’ll find various zombie-workers helping you clear the island and build a town, such as woodcutters, stoneminers, fishermen, treasure hunters and cooks. You'll be able to harvest dozens of unique plants and make terrific potions. You can travel to different islands in search of new treasures in order to reach the Ancestors’ Land, become a Human, and then return to the city of people and find your Love.

Follow us on our official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ZombieCastaways/

Terms of Use: http://vizor-interactive.com/documents/zc_mobile/eula_googleplay.html
Privacy Policy: http://vizor-interactive.com/documents/zc_mobile/pp_googleplay.html

descriptionHTML:
NEW in the mobile games market! Unique new style and new features!

Such a game you have not seen!

Amazing combination of modern pixel graphics, first person shooter, stickman and zombie with numerous special effects!

Keep the defense inside the house, which storms the bloodthirsty crowd. Survive in this difficult battle! Build a barricade and use numerous weapons (knives, axes, pistols, assault rifles and shotguns).

Watch your back! Achieve maximum success.

In this game you will get:

- Cubic first-person shooter.
- Modern unique locations in pixel style.
- A large arsenal of weapons (from a knife to a machine gun).
- Characters and design, as in Maynkraft.
- Characters in stylistics. Stickman.
- Pixel version of the game Black Ops Zombie.

Features:
- Modern realistic physics.
- Pocket edition, so you can play on the road.
- Dynamic action in confined spaces.
- Craft weapons and cartridges.
- Hardcore bosses.

Technical support:
- The game was created by a professional team of developers with the involvement of specialists in directing and sound.
- The game will be updated on an ongoing basis.
- Leave comments and write to us. Any of your comments will not be left without attention.

Play good games such as Stickman Combat Pixel Edition!

description: Find out what the Daily and FIA Races are without having to turn on your console and keep track of your stats and achievements from Gran Turismo Sport.*Features*- Daily Races (updated daily)- FIA Races (updated every Sunday)- User Profile (automatically updated from GT servers)- Achievements (automatically updated from GT servers)No login needed, just use your PSN ID and we'll retrieve your public information from GT's website.This companion app is a fan project (unofficial) and is in no way affiliated with the Gran Turismo brand or Sony Computer Entertainment.
descriptionHTML:
Find out what the Daily and FIA Races are without having to turn on your console and keep track of your stats and achievements from Gran Turismo Sport.

*Features*
- Daily Races (updated daily)
- FIA Races (updated every Sunday)
- User Profile (automatically updated from GT servers)
- Achievements (automatically updated from GT servers)

No login needed, just use your PSN ID and we'll retrieve your public information from GT's website.

This companion app is a fan project (unofficial) and is in no way affiliated with the Gran Turismo brand or Sony Computer Entertainment.
recentChanges: - Added "pull to refresh" feature on profile page
- Fixed ad banner apperaring over logout button
summary: Companion app for the latest entry of one of the most beloved racing game series
title: GT Sport Companion
